data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module has been up on CPAN for years. I've just been remiss in
    registering it. No new rootlevel namespace created. I've finally
    gotten around to registering it after reading on the modules mailing
    list about the number of unregistered modules, and I didn't want to
    be part of the problem.
